title: Cozy Crunch
overview:
A cozy, upgrade filled, adventure that goes from curious kitty to unstoppable leaf-crunching beast.  Stomp, explore, and uncover cozy forest secrets with your magical fairy guide.Time your triple stomps to the music for a special attackCollect hidden treasuresSurvive wild windsCustomize your character
Cozy Crunch is a gentle, whimsical adventure where you guide a curious cat through a crunchy leaf-filled forest using a magical fairy (your mouse cursor). Stomp leaves, uncover secrets, and explore hand-crafted areas filled with cozy atmosphere and charming surprises.Features:Simple point and click controls4 hand crafted areasA hidden rhythm mechanic - time your triple stomps to the music to unleash powerful wavesRelaxing original soundtrackCharacter customization (50+ variations)Multiple progression paths with quests, hidden items, and upgradesSteam achievementsGame Duration: ~3-4+ hoursWishlist Cozy Crunch and prepare to leaf your worries behindWhat Streamers are Saying“I’ve come to the conclusion this game is weirdly therapeutic!” -ImCadeAbout the gameHi! I’m Jo, a solo indie developer, and this is my first game. Cozy Crunch is inspired by the charm of classic online flash games. Simple, relaxing, and designed to be enjoyed in a single cozy evening. I hope it brings you a bit of calm and delight, just like it did for me while creating it.
